Visual impairments, including color deficiencies and other visual limitations can be compensated for by customizing the content elements as desired. For this purpose we have developed a contrast mode, intelligent font enlargement, a screen reader and several other features.

To put it simply: Our zoom recognizes which content should be enlarged, and how much. The original page layout remains the same, but you can read the content with ease.

âœ“ Contrast mode
In our numerous interviews with users with visual disabilities, we learned which contrast combinations allow the most accessible view. We provide these modes to our users as options for background and font color. You can configure both the foreground and the background of every website just as you need it.

With our intuitive â€œread-aloudâ€ function you can simply have the text content read to you. You are able to choose which content shall be read, or you can just listen to the whole page at once.

âœ“ Navigation via keyboard
In combination with our friendly audio output you can browse the internet without using a mouse or a screen. You can decide yourself which content you want to navigate via your keyboard.
